Messages.description: The cash unit is in a good state
The cash unit is almost full (i.e. reached or exceeded the threshold defined by ulMaximum).
The cash unit is almost empty (i.e. reached or below the threshold defined by ulMinimum).
The cash unit is empty, or insufficient items in the cash unit are preventing further dispense operations.
The values of the specified cash unit are not available
There is no reference value available for the notes in this cash unit. The cash unit has not been calibrated.
The cash unit has been inserted when the device was not in the exchange state. This cash unit cannot be dispensed from.
